tasks.label: C++: Build & Run (clang asan)
tasks.command: clang++ -nostdinc++ -std=gnu++20 -stdlib=libstdc++ -g -O1 -fsanitize=address -fno-omit-frame-pointer -Wno-deprecated -DLOCAL -I/opt/homebrew/Cellar/gcc/14.2.0_1/include/c++/14 -I/opt/homebrew/Cellar/gcc/14.2.0_1/include/c++/14/aarch64-apple-darwin24 -I/opt/homebrew/Cellar/gcc/14.2.0_1/include/c++/14/backward "${fileBasename}" -L/opt/homebrew/Cellar/gcc/14.2.0_1/lib/gcc/14 -Wl,-rpath,/opt/homebrew/Cellar/gcc/14.2.0_1/lib/gcc/14 -o a.out && ASAN_OPTIONS=detect_leaks=0 ./a.out < i.in > o.out; rc=$?; rm -f a.out; rm -rf a.out.dSYM; if [ -f o.out ]; then "/Applications/Visual Studio Code.app/Contents/Resources/app/bin/code" --reuse-window o.out; fi; exit $rc
